abstract: Arafat M Nagi of Lackawanna, NY, is latest American citizen to be arrested for attempting to join Islamic State terrorist group; FBI agents were alerted to Nagi by cooperating witness previously convicted on terrorism charge but lawyer says defendant has done nothing inherently illegal.
lead_paragraph: Arafat M. Nagi, from Lackawanna, N.Y., is the latest to be accused of trying to support a terrorist group; he faces up to 15 years in prison.

headline.main: Man From Buffalo Area Is Charged With Trying to Aid ISIS
headline.print_headline: Man From the Buffalo Area Is Charged With Trying to Aid ISIS

snippet: Arafat M. Nagi, from Lackawanna, N.Y., is the latest to be accused of trying to support a terrorist group; he faces up to 15 years in prison.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
